text: Amir Sarkhosh (born May 30, 1991) is an Iranian snooker player. Amir Sarkhosh won his first international position in Lebanon in 2013 and won a solo bronze and gold team in the West Asian championship, and has won three more in a team in 2013. After winning the Q Tour Global Playoff, he will turn professional in 2024.https://www.snooker.org/res/index.asp?player=1350 == References == == Other websites == * Amir Sarkhosh at snooker.org * Amir Sarkhosh at snookerdatabase.co.uk Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian snooker players
title: Amir Sarkhosh
